subject: Order #SSN4134 not delivered and no info
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered a simsonn pedals Simsonn Pro X Ultra (#SSN4134) that should have
been delivered on Monday the 9th of December by DHL and wasn't.
In the tracking number (CE326635225DE) says it's in Lisbon since 9th
December and no more information.

I tried to call the DHL phone numbers and sent and message through their
website and no answer.

I would appreciate your help in the matter because I'm having a very
unpleasant experience with this buying.

Best regards,



Com os melhores cumprimentos,



*Álvaro José Silva *

conversations.body_text: Arrived today without the baseplate. Opened a new ticket
Hi Álvaro José Silva,             Hello, the base plate tracking number is JSELX1705727964YQ. You can track it here: https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=JSELX1705727964YQ
